name: Tomato
description: The tomato is a widely cultivated fruit-bearing plant that produces edible berries. It is known for its versatility in cooking and high nutritional value, rich in vitamins A and C, potassium, and antioxidants like lycopene.

environmental_requirements.soil_type: Well-drained, loamy soil rich in organic matter
environmental_requirements.watering_frequency: Regular, moderate watering, allowing soil to dry between waterings

visual_characteristics.fruit_color: Red, yellow, green, or purple depending on the variety
